'use strict';
var createStore = require('fluxible/addons').createStore;
var __DEV__ = process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production';
 
function stateIdentity(state) {
    return state;
}
 
var DEFAULT_METHODS = {
    dehydrate: stateIdentity,
    rehydrate: stateIdentity
};
 
module.exports = function createReducerStore(storeName, reducers, initialState, methods) {
    methods = methods || {};
    var _reducers = {};
    var _methods = {};
    var ReducerStore = createStore({
        storeName: storeName,
        handlers: {},
        initialize: function initialize() {
            this.state = initialState;
        },
        getState: function getState() {
            return this.state;
        },
        dehydrate: function dehydrate() {
            return _methods.dehydrate(this.state);
        },
        rehydrate: function rehydrate(state) {
            this.state = _methods.rehydrate(state);
        }
    });
 
    function replaceReducers(reducers) {
        // Allow a single reducer function
        if (typeof reducers === 'function') {
            reducers = {
                'default': reducers
            };
        }
 
        _reducers = Object.assign({}, _reducers, reducers);
 
        // Create a handler proxy for each reducer so that the store can
        // still be lazy instantiated.
        Object.keys(reducers).forEach(function eachReducer(handlerName) {
            var reducer = reducers[handlerName];
            Eif (!ReducerStore.handlers[handlerName]) {
                ReducerStore.handlers[handlerName] = function (payload, eventName) {
                    Eif (__DEV__) {
                        Iif (!_reducers[handlerName]) {
                            throw new Error(handlerName + ' reducer on ' + storeName + ' has been removed but was still called.');
                        }
                    }
                    var startingState = this.state;
                    this.state = _reducers[handlerName](this.state, payload, eventName);
                    if (this.state !== startingState) {
                        this.emitChange();
                    }
                };
            }
        });
    }
    ReducerStore.replaceReducer = replaceReducers;
    ReducerStore.replaceReducers = replaceReducers;
 
    ReducerStore.replaceMethods = function replaceMethods(methods) {
        _methods = Object.assign({}, DEFAULT_METHODS, _methods, methods);
        Object.keys(_methods).forEach(function (methodName) {
            if (!ReducerStore.prototype[methodName]) {
                ReducerStore.prototype[methodName] = function () {
                    Eif (__DEV__) {
                        Iif (!_methods[methodName]) {
                            throw new Error(methodName + ' on ' + storeName + ' has been removed but was still called.');
                        }
                    }
                    var state = this.state;
                    var args = [state].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments));
                    return _methods[methodName].apply(null, args);
                };
            }
        });
    };
 
    ReducerStore.replaceReducers(reducers);
    ReducerStore.replaceMethods(methods);
 
    return ReducerStore;
};
